TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EventSourceSettings extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies configuration options for an event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Only F:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceSettings.EtwManifestEventFormat?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True or F:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceSettings.EtwSelfDescribingEventFormat?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True should be specified, but not both.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceSettings Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: None of the special configuration options are enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceSettings EtwManifestEventFormat = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The ETW listener should use a manifest-based format when raising events. Setting this option is a directive to the ETW listener should use manifest-based format when raising events. This is the default option when defining a type derived from T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True using one of the protected T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True constructors.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceSettings EtwSelfDescribingEventFormat = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The ETW listener should use self-describing event format. This is the default option when creating a new instance of the T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True using one of the public T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True constructors.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceSettings ThrowOnEventWriteErrors = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The event source throws an exception when an error occurs.
